text: "Electric Avenue" is a reggae song released by Guyanese singer Eddy Grant on his Killer on the Rampage album in January 1983. It is a reggae, synthpop, new wave, and disco song. Grant wrote and produced the song himself. It reached #2 on both the United States and UK singles charts. The song is named after a market street in Brixton, London, England. It has been covered by many artists. == References == Category:1983 songs Category:Reggae songs Category:Songs about London
title: Electric Avenue (song)
